issues_reports.text: @VZWSupport Been through this already. It’s only been 31 days of back and forth with you guys and yet no one can manage to simply do their job. It’s nothing but lie after lie, transfer after transfer. Hey @TMobile and @ATT which one of you guys have better customer service?

Dear @TMobile 

How does your in store reps NOT put in any promo's given the day a new account is created so when one has an issue the next rep can help ? What a joke. @Verizon is gonna get a call from me now.
.@TMobile just had the strangest outage from 4 - 420 PM … anyone else? #Tmobile
my service is getting worse by the day, T-mobile i hate you with my entire soul
Hey @TMobile  why is my internet not working ? I can send and receive calls and texts but no internet without wifi?
@TMobileHelp Signal didn’t come back til I left the reservation area so I couldn’t respond
**** T-Mobile I’m going to Verizon 🤟🏾

I had assumed that years after eSIM came out it would be simpler to move carriers.  Apparently, T-Mobile can’t activate a line without a physical SIM card.  It’s beyond dumb that they have to ship me a physical SIM card.  Waste of their money and a poor customer experience .

@TMobileHelp Thanks for the help Eric. But, here's the skinny - don't let them talk you into anything that you don't want to do. No migration of service is needed, now. Push back and tell them what you want or don't want. Be your best advocate and fight for yourself, save yourself $$.
@TMobile you suck. I wish you never took over Sprint

I'll be unsubscribing from the un-carrier... @TMobile was great until my recent inquiry to upgrade. I was told twice that I qualify for a promotion; now they've informed me that I need to pay full price. I'd rather cancel service and start over elsewhere!
@TMobileHelp @TMobile I would really like a setting that sends Scam Likely calls directly to my voice mail. Please make finding this solution this someone's full time job.
@TMobile So glad to have switched to your service after reading about @ATT funding far right drivel. #tmobile
@SKTV_ Oh, @TMobileHelp is just gonna have you reset your network settings and/or turn off your 5g 😒
T-Mobile & Dis Slow *** Data I’m Finna Sue @TMobile
@TMobileHelp hello ... Can you help me activate a new Sim card for a current line on my account?
I try to give quarterly lump sums. Like I’ll put 300/400 on T-Mobile and know I don’t gotta deal with them for months. Y’all login to those portals every month?! I smoke too much to remember that lol
Wtf going on with T-Mobile

Dear @TMobile 

How does your in store reps NOT put in any promo's given the day a new account is created so when one has an issue the next rep can help ? What a joke, @VZWSupport is gonna get a call from me now.

@TMobileHelp @NevilleRay I just talked to someone in my DMs. Basically said we don't have any plans for your area. Been with you guys for almost 15 years. About to switch for more reliable service. I'm in KC where you just inherited an entire campus and a football stadium. No service there either. Trash.
@TMobileHelp im on 2 bars of services 24/7 any help?
@TMobile run me my **** I ordered it last week!!!
@TMobile Hi guys just wondering if there's some type of problem in the Palm Beach/Boca area been getting dialup speeds most of the day?

I used to think all networks were the same but damn @TMobile you're slow.  Slower than @Verizon. Like everything you get what you pay for.  I get a cheaper plan I get slower signal service, the circle of life

@TMobileHelp Is it true that it's impossible to activate a phone on eSIM?  Customer service has spent the last hour telling that.  And that I have wait 3 days for a physical SIM to be shipped because it's not possible for me to pick up one from a T-Mobile store.
I regularly talk **** about T-Mobile users for funsies, but ever since the last time I made fun of a T-Mobile user like a month ago I’ve had terrible wifi connectivity & signal literally every day

@TMobile How bout you switch over to a better customer service experience. You take my money for the watch series 7. Estimated ship 10/11-10/18. Call on 10-18 and no idea when the watches will ship. Hmmm here’s a clue communicate that to all that ordered one. Nightmare
**** T-MOBILE IM CHANGING TO VERSION @TMobileBusiness
@TMobile We’re having trouble logging into your website.

@TMobile had a small problem with my bill was able to call in and get it corrected very easily you guys are so much better to work with than sprint was thank you for taking them over and fixing things...

company_posts.name: T-Mobile Help
company_posts.text: Hi. I'm confident we can help you get connected while traveling internationally. Let's start here: https://t.co/lPgj2dMFn9. Please DM us where you're traveling and more about what's going on with your connection. We'll quickly find a resolution to stay connected. ^SharonBaca

company_posts.name: T-Mobile Help
company_posts.text: We can help with any device issues you're experiencing and make sure you have a working phone. Please DM us with your device IMEI, more about what's happening with your phone and account information. We'll work together to find the best solution for you to stay. ^SharonBaca

company_posts.name: T-Mobile Help
company_posts.text: Hi, I'm positive I can help you with your service or account questions right now and turn this around so you don't have to return your phones. Please DM us with more details about what's happening, device IMEI, and account info. We'll work fast to find a resolution. ^SharonBaca
